item.title: Dr. Yusuke Shimizu's paper got most cite paper at PTEP
item.description: We are happy to congratulate Dr. Yusuke Shimizu, a staff in our group! He and his collaborators’ paper got the most cite paper at Progress of Theoretical and Experimental Physics (PTEP) journal.

item.title: Dr. Sakai won the Flash Talk Award at QM2022!
item.description: We are happy to congratulate Dr. Sakai, a postdoc in our group! She won the Flash Talk Award at the Quark Matter (QM) 2022 (29th International Conference on Ultra-relativistic Nucleus-Nucleus Collisions) international conference.
